author: JHiltbrand
body:
#### PR description:

This PR makes a small adjustment to the `AlCaHcalIsotrkProducer` and adds an associated configuration to point said producer to HLT object collections. This is in anticipation of running the `HcalCalIsoTrackProducerFilter` ALCARECO on a new dedicated AlCaRaw data stream: `AlCaHcalIsoTrk`, which will be fed by an updated/new `AlCa_IsoTrackHBHE_v` path.

Additional background information related to updating the `HLT_IsoTrackHB/HE_v` path(s): [CMSHLT-3519](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3519), [CMSHLT-3517](https://its.cern.ch/jira/browse/CMSHLT-3517)

ATTN: @leyva-daina, @perrotta, @bsunanda 

#### PR validation:

Processed some HLTPhysics RAW with the new `AlCa_IsoTrackHBHE_v` to produce input for the ALCARECO producer+filter. Run over this input via the command:

```
python3 RunPromptReco.py --scenario=AlCaHcalIsoTrk_Run3  --global-tag  141X_dataRun3_Prompt_v3 --lfn=file:input.root --alcarecos=HcalCalIsoTrkFromAlCaRaw
```

#### If this PR is a backport please specify the original PR and why you need to backport that PR. If this PR will be backported please specify to which release cycle the backport is meant for:

A corresponding backport to 15_0_X: #47975
title: Add Config for Running HcalCalIsoTrkProducerFilter ALCARECO on new AlCaHcalIsoTrk AlCaRaw Stream
